credit_line: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
title: Poster Design:  Spring in the Country
medium: Brush and gouache, black ink  collaged illustration, graphite on heavy cream paper
description: In the upper half of sheet, a two-toned green oak leaf silhouetted against a larger green leaf which is superimposed on a larger black leaf.  These are floating in a pale blue sky with wispy white clouds.  In the lower half of sheet, flush to right margin, a collaged illustration of a tree-lined country road.  In upper right corner, in large black capital letters, SPRING.  At center left, in small black capital letters, IN THE COUNTRY.  At lower center, horizontal graphite lines indicate space for text.
name: Drawing
